The staff were very attentive and our food and drinks arrived really quickly. High quality food; would recommend the pizza, burgers and brownie which had nuts and was served warm. Live music was great touch!

Chameera even noticed my friend drop her knife and replaced...it instantly even though she wasn't using it. And was always looking out if we wanted to order anything else. Thank y it instantly even though she wasn't using it. And was always looking out if we wanted to order anything else. Thank you!

Great view and service. The pizza was nice and thin and Delivered very fast.  We also had bruschetta, which I can recommend. Our waiter, Anthony, was very helpful and made sure everything was in order.
We had the pizza and chicken wrap, Chameera was our server and provided an exceptional service! Thank you so much for the delicious food and great service

Partner and I went for dinner after seeing the beer battered fish on Google photos. Were left disappointed. Chips were fine. Beer batter really good. Fish however didn't taste fresh. One piece we didn't eat due to how fishy it smelt. Lucky that one of...us ordered the crispy chicken burger as that was amazing. Would definitely return for that and also the awesome service from Chamee us ordered the crispy chicken burger as that was amazing. Would definitely return for that and also the awesome service from Chameera.
Great place and nice vibe for a couple. Friendly staff❤️ Thank you Mr. Dumindu for the friendly service. Highly recommend the place
Delicious pizza (Tonno, vegetarian), very tasty deserts (brownies with ice cream) and nice atmosphere! Fast and really good!
Delicious pizza and beer, recommend this place! Dumindu waiter was great!! Take a ham & mushroom pizza, you won’t regret !

They have best pizza in Mirissa, stuff is really nice…. Best regards to our waiter Anthony. We asked for a mobile charger and he did his best to find it. Very kind!!!!! Thank you Anthony for a great lunch vibes :))
Highly recommend the meatball pizza and seafood risotto. Our waiter was Anthony and he was a star. Very attentive and sharp. Don’t hesitate to ask him for suggestions! Overall 9.5/10

Amazing food ! Seafood risotto was incredible, prawns were amazing and pizzas are gorgeous.  Service was brilliant and great decent standard chilled red wine at a very reasonable price.  Anthony was superb!
Tasty food and quick, excellent service from Dumindu who placed a fan right next to us as we were very hot annd bothered. Enjoyed the experience and would come back again.

One of few good pizza places in Sri Lanka. 

I can definitely recommend this place if you want pizza in Mirissa 

Dumindu was very pleasant and patient with us

Great pizza and wine .. 

Service excellent and good atmosphere. Had a great night 

I Would recommend to others for clean good food with good service
Food was really good, especially pizza! Also workers Anthony and Dumindy were super friendly! Atmosphere was also nice.
Great food with fast services with the waiter Dumimdu, will recommending this to all my friends that travel to mirissa.
